## Description {#details}

Post-legalization lowering for instructions.

This is used to offload pattern matching from the selector.

For example, this combiner will notice that a G&#95;SHUFFLE&#95;VECTOR is actually a G&#95;ZIP, G&#95;UZP, etc.

General optimization combines should be handled by either the AArch64PostLegalizerCombiner or the AArch64PreLegalizerCombiner.

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Represents a pseudo instruction which replaces a G&#95;SHUFFLE&#95;VECTOR.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/shufflevectorpseudo"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">struct </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/shufflevectorpseudo/#a8fc18e773fdd4a1c87b86e88045bf673">ShuffleVectorPseudo</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Check if a G&#95;EXT instruction can handle a shuffle mask \\p M when the vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sources of the shuffle are different.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#acf625a32c19c58380ada30e43781d0ae"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;std::pair&lt;bool, uint64&#95;t&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#acf625a32c19c58380ada30e43781d0ae">getExtMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> M,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for the first non-undef element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> FirstRealElt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac78c09ae232b2ce188ff590d51e3c268">find&#95;if</a>(M, &#91;&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Elt) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Elt &gt;= 0; &#125;);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (FirstRealElt == M.end())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use APInt to handle overflow when calculating expected element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MaskBits = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(32, NumElts &#42; 2).<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#aae3b959a0a2981340fd03c29f528f2f0">logBase2</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> ExpectedElt = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a>(MaskBits, &#42;FirstRealElt + 1, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The following shuffle indices must be the successive elements after the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// first real element.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a61d13d6824ec46c31260a4fd0997eda0">any&#95;of</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a341215803e83773a3e97860dc291f121">make&#95;range</a>(std::next(FirstRealElt), M.end()),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">          &#91;&amp;ExpectedElt&#93;(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Elt) &#123; return Elt != ExpectedElt++ &amp;&amp; Elt &gt;= 0; &#125;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The index of an EXT is the first element if it is not UNDEF.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Watch out for the beginning UNDEFs. The EXT index should be the expected</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value of the first element.  E.g.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;-1, -1, 3, ...&gt; is treated as &lt;1, 2, 3, ...&gt;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &lt;-1, -1, 0, 1, ...&gt; is treated as &lt;2&#42;NumElts-2, 2&#42;NumElts-1, 0, 1, ...&gt;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ExpectedElt is the last mask index plus 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t Imm = ExpectedElt.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#a217e0207d9cc8e046c2dccbf0e4bb198">getZExtValue</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ReverseExt = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There are two difference cases requiring to reverse input vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For example, for vector &lt;4 x i32&gt; we have the following cases,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Case 1: shufflevector(&lt;4 x i32&gt;,&lt;4 x i32&gt;,&lt;-1, -1, -1, 0&gt;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Case 2: shufflevector(&lt;4 x i32&gt;,&lt;4 x i32&gt;,&lt;-1, -1, 7, 0&gt;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For both cases, we finally use mask &lt;5, 6, 7, 0&gt;, which requires</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to reverse two input vectors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &lt; NumElts)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ReverseExt = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Imm -= NumElts;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(ReverseExt, Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Helper function for matchINS.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns a value when \\p M is an ins mask for \\p NumInputElements.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// First element of the returned pair is true when the produced</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// G&#95;INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT destination should be the LHS of the G&#95;SHUFFLE&#95;VECTOR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Second element is the destination lane for the G&#95;INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#a61f448f38b08c0471d67cb0b0240ba86"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;std::pair&lt;bool, int&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#a61f448f38b08c0471d67cb0b0240ba86">isINSMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> M,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumInputElements) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M.size() != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">size&#95;t</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(NumInputElements))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumLHSMatch = 0, NumRHSMatch = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LastLHSMismatch = -1, LastRHSMismatch = -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Idx = 0; Idx &lt; NumInputElements; ++Idx) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M&#91;Idx&#93; == -1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumLHSMatch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++NumRHSMatch;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    M&#91;Idx&#93; == Idx ? ++NumLHSMatch : LastLHSMismatch = Idx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    M&#91;Idx&#93; == Idx + NumInputElements ? ++NumRHSMatch : LastRHSMismatch = Idx;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumNeededToMatch = NumInputElements - 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumLHSMatch == NumNeededToMatch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, LastLHSMismatch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (NumRHSMatch == NumNeededToMatch)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::make&#95;pair(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, LastRHSMismatch);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::nullopt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\return true if a G&#95;SHUFFLE&#95;VECTOR instruction \\p MI can be replaced with a</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try to match a vector splat operation into a dup instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We&#39;re looking for this pattern:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %scalar:gpr(s64) = COPY $x0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %undef:fpr(&lt;2 x s64&gt;) = G&#95;IMPLICIT&#95;DEF</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %cst0:gpr(s32) = G&#95;CONSTANT i32 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %zerovec:fpr(&lt;2 x s32&gt;) = G&#95;BUILD&#95;VECTOR %cst0(s32), %cst0(s32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %ins:fpr(&lt;2 x s64&gt;) = G&#95;INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT %undef, %scalar(s64), %cst0(s32)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %splat:fpr(&lt;2 x s64&gt;) = G&#95;SHUFFLE&#95;VECTOR %ins(&lt;2 x s64&gt;), %undef,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %zerovec(&lt;2 x s32&gt;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// ...into:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// %splat = G&#95;DUP %scalar</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Begin matching the insert.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;InsMI = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0edf31d256ecb3ac003bf2d81a576c9e">getOpcodeDef</a>(TargetOpcode::G&#95;INSERT&#95;VECTOR&#95;ELT,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Match the undef vector operand.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a0edf31d256ecb3ac003bf2d81a576c9e">getOpcodeDef</a>(TargetOpcode::G&#95;IMPLICIT&#95;DEF, InsMI-&gt;getOperand(1).getReg(),</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if an EXT instruction can handle the shuffle mask when the vector</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sources of the shuffle are the same.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#ac8d7723495a75e290cb489accc124544"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#ac8d7723495a75e290cb489accc124544">isSingletonExtMask</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;int&gt;</a> M, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/llt">LLT</a> Ty) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumElts = Ty.getNumElements();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Assume that the first shuffle index is not UNDEF.  Fail if it is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M&#91;0&#93; &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this is a VEXT shuffle, the immediate value is the index of the first</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// element.  The other shuffle indices must be the successive elements after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the first one.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExpectedElt = M&#91;0&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; NumElts; ++<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Increment the expected index.  If it wraps around, just follow it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// back to index zero and keep going.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++ExpectedElt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExpectedElt == NumElts)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ExpectedElt = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (M&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93; &lt; 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore UNDEF indices.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ExpectedElt != </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">&gt;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">(M&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Determine if it is possible to modify the \\p RHS and predicate \\p P of a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// G&#95;ICMP instruction such that the right-hand side is an arithmetic immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns A pair containing the updated immediate and predicate which may</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// be used to optimize the instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\note This assumes that the comparison has been legalized.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::optional&lt;std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, CmpInst::Predicate&gt;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#a681a012ac18b27513b6715881d002520"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#a681a012ac18b27513b6715881d002520">tryAdjustICmpImmAndPred</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> RHS, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/cmpinst/#a2be3583dac92a031fa1458d4d992c78b">CmpInst::Predicate</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;Ty = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>.getType(RHS);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 32 || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> == 64) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Expected 32 or 64 bit compare only?&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the RHS is not a constant, or the RHS is already a valid arithmetic</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// immediate, then there is nothing to change.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t OriginalC = ValAndVReg-&gt;Value.getZExtValue();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#ac6aa1387c4375260e2468eb5a77fdb4cafd841a49aec1539bc88abc8ff9e170fb">C</a> = OriginalC;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns true if it would be profitable to swap the LHS and RHS of a G&#95;ICMP</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// instruction \\p MI.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#a177c66f5e165807020847e8ce53e036c"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-aarch64postlegalizerlowering-cpp-/#a177c66f5e165807020847e8ce53e036c">trySwapICmpOperands</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineregisterinfo">MachineRegisterInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOpcode() == TargetOpcode::G&#95;ICMP);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Swap the operands if it would introduce a profitable folding opportunity.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (e.g. a shift + extend).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  For example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    lsl     w13, w11, #1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    cmp     w13, w12</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// can be turned into:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    cmp     w12, w11, lsl #1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Don&#39;t swap if there&#39;s a constant on the RHS, because we know we can fold</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// that.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> RHS = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.getOperand(3).getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RHSCst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac76eb82370e997f967454f441effbbff">getIConstantVRegValWithLookThrough</a>(RHS, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64advsimdscalarpass-cpp/#aacd2ab195054a3e6a74bfbb9d5d571c8">MRI</a>);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GetRegForProfit = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/register">Register</a> Reg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// \\returns a function which builds a vector floating point compare instruction</span></CodeLine>
